Melanie Lynskey (Heavenly Creatures, Two and a Half Men) and Justin talk about working on Lady of the Manor while navigating new motherhood on set, her misophonia, and Melanie‚Äôs husband, Jason Ritter, hops on to shed some light on recent hairstyle drama in their house.
